column2: Job Title: English Subject Matter Expert (SME) Location: Manjeera Pipeline Road, Hafeezpet Hyderabad-500049 Job Type: Full-Time Introduction: At Unicent International School, we believe in delivering quality educational content and exceptional learning experiences. We are seeking an experienced English Subject Matter Expert to join our team. Work closely with curriculum designers, instructional designers, and other SMEs to create cohesive and comprehensive educational programs. Stay updated with the latest pedagogical trends, educational technology advancements, and curriculum changes within the field of English education. Participate in content validation processes, ensuring accuracy, relevance, and educational efficacy. Address feedback received from educators, students, and peer reviews to continually improve content quality. Qualifications: Masters degree or higher in English, Literature, or a related field. Exceptional writing and editing skills, with a strong ability to convey complex ideas in a clear and engaging manner. Experience in curriculum and assessment design is highly preferred. Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Proficient with digital tools and platforms used for educational content creation and delivery. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Desired Skills: Certification in teaching English as a second language (TESL/TEFL/TESOL). Experience with e-learning and digital education tools. Publication credits in relevant educational or literary journals. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package.
